notes: Elements listed are those that appear to be global/repeated template components (header, global navigation, persistent widgets).
Some items (e.g., campaign banners) may be seasonal but are still implemented as reusable header modules.
Media URLs below were extracted from the downloaded homepage HTML (screenshots/sis_home.html). Some icons are injected via Grunticon (CSS/SVG) and may not have direct URLs.

global_template_elements.name: site_identity_block
global_template_elements.description: Left-aligned BINUS University + School of Information Systems identity lockup (logo + text).

content_elements.label: BINUS University / School of Information Systems logo lockup

global_template_elements.name: campaign_badges_strip
global_template_elements.description: A row of small campaign/brand badges near the top header (e.g., anniversary/initiative badges).
notes: Badge set may change over time, but the container/slot pattern is likely consistent.

global_template_elements.name: primary_cta_button
global_template_elements.description: Prominent orange pill CTA button in the header.

content_elements.label: Gabung BINUS icon (left segment of CTA)
Right arrow/chevron inside CTA (implemented as inline CSS border arrow, not an image URL)
content_elements.implementation_note: Rendered via <i> element with CSS borders/rotation; no external media URL.

global_template_elements.name: utility_links_row
global_template_elements.description: A thin row of utility links above the main nav (right side).
notes: Exact labels may vary by program/site section, but the pattern (small utility links row) is a reusable header module.

global_template_elements.name: main_navigation_bar
global_template_elements.description: Main navigation with dropdowns and a hamburger/menu icon for responsive layouts.

global_template_elements.name: search_trigger
global_template_elements.description: Search icon in the top-right corner of the header area.

content_elements.label: Search icon (magnifier) (Grunticon embedded SVG/CSS)
content_elements.implementation_note: Element uses data-grunticon-embed; icon is loaded from Grunticon CSS sprite sheets.

global_template_elements.name: consultation_widget
global_template_elements.description: Persistent floating 'Click to Consultation!' widget on the right side of the viewport.

behavior.interaction: click opens consultation/contact flow (likely modal or external link)

media_elements_likely_reused.name: header_logos_and_badges
media_elements_likely_reused.description: Logo lockup + rotating/maintained campaign badges used across pages.

media_elements_likely_reused.name: cta_iconography
media_elements_likely_reused.description: Iconography used in the primary CTA button.
notes: The right chevron is not an image; it is rendered via CSS borders on an <i> element.

media_elements_likely_reused.name: search_icon
media_elements_likely_reused.description: Magnifier icon used to open search (Grunticon).

media_elements_likely_reused.name: consultation_widget_badge
media_elements_likely_reused.description: Small badge used in the consultation widget.

implementation_hints_for_microsite.description: Implement a two-tier header: (1) utility links row, (2) main nav row with dropdowns + primary CTA + search.
Optional: implement a fixed-position side CTA widget for quick contact/consultation, styled as a light-blue pill with subtle shadow (per design guideline).
